roleset.name: taking a risk with

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Much legislation existed at the time to govern the gambling of money on dice games.

example.name: with LOC
example.text: On Indian gaming , I 'll mention that the Navajo Nation put casino gambling on the ballot twice .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, gamble-n.01. Corresponds to VNcls rely-70, risk-94.
